channel.title: rap on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in rap on Rusland 1

item.title: The Chemodan – Our Hip-Hop (Наш Хип-Хоп)
item.description: By The Chemodan (Facebook, VK). Featuring Эфди Вадим (Efdi/fd Vadim, VK) and ОУ74 (24smi, VK). Video featuring Denis Sladkov (Denis Sladkov). Directed by Лёша Ломов (Lesja Lomov, Instagram, YouTube). From Абсурд и аллегория (2015). Lyrics More Круги под глазами (2014) Запах Урбана (with Brick Bazuka) (2014) Выживший выкидыш (2014) Read The Chemodan: “I’m like a football fan.

item.title: Слава КПСС – Eternal Return & Funeral
item.description: Against Against Face, against Oxxxymoron (with Замай/Zamay), against Nikolay Sobolev with the Sobolev diss, against many others at the same time with the I’ll sing my music diss. There’s a Shnurov and a Freshmen Diss, and more—there’s even a Top 10 Slava KPSS Disses.

item.title: Sabi Miss – Silent Mode (без звука)
item.description: Поставить and трубка Поставлю is the first-person form of поставить, the perfective counterpart of ставить. Conjugations can be found on Master Russian and (with some example sentences) Russian Step by Step. A трубка (which here becomes трубку in the accusative case) is, besides a pipe, a slang word for phone.

item.title: Pharaoh (ft. The Chemodan Clan) – Problems
item.description: Бабки несут проблемы Суки несут проблемы Все, что несет проблемы Делает меня зверем Money or Grandmas That word бабки can be misunderstood (as Google Translate used to or – update – did) as grandmas, derived from бабушки. But it’s actually a slang term for money.

item.title: Face 3x
item.description: About Face and Face Himself An entertaining portrait can be found in a vlog (2017, 11 min) by the eccentric NFKRZ. Face as the Russian Lil Pump. In 2018, the Russian BBC conducted an interview (23 min). Я перестал бояться: I stopped being afraid.

item.title: Yury Khovansky – This is Russia
item.description: Most Beautiful From the video description: Клип “Это Америка” лишний раз доказал, что мы с вами живем в самой прекрасной стране – the clip “This is America” once again proved that we live in the most beautiful country. В качестве гимна я предлагаю вам этот дисс: as a hymn, I offer you this diss.

item.title: Kizaru 3x
item.description: Что ты знаешь обо мне (2018) Lyrics, lyrics video Russian Most Wanted (2017) Lyrics Karaoke version Никто не нужен (2015) Lyrics Karaoke version Clip (only) on YouTube. Bonus: Оу щит (2016) Recent (2020): Message; Narcos

item.title: Kerry Force 3x
item.description: Though she has kids now, and is probably a great mom. Больно не мне (2011) There’s also a lyric video. Tekst Кроме слов (2012) Featuring Pra (Killa’Gramm). There’s also a live version (2015). Tekst За жи во (2013) Tekst

item.title: Guf 3x
item.description: Имеет место (2011) Это может быть даже не музыка, Но это качает из соседнего тазика. Это имеет место быть, Можно выключить, но это нельзя удалить. (Lyrics) ACAB (2015) Хочу передать привет всем парням Которые сейчас не тут, а там Чтоб не забыть никого, не буду называть имена Такие времена, I’m a criminal

item.title: Зануда 3x
item.description: Папиросы (2010): Cigarettes A папироса is a cigarette. Папиросы is the plural form (also the title of the album) and, according to the lyrics, it’s the solution to all вопросы (questions). The lyrics video shows some unique tobacco products; the clip itself is smoke-free.

item.title: Каспийский Груз 3x
item.description: Табор уходит в небо (The Caravan Ascends to Heaven, 2015) Singing bids him farewell. Lyrics Я бы уехал (I Would Leave, 2017) For those who can handle fighting (there’s also a version with just cars). Text at the bottom right: Бог спасет, братва поможет – God saves, the brothers help.

item.title: Centr 3x
item.description: Padarok Also from there: ‘Initially, they wrote an unofficial album Подарок (Podarok / Gift), but only 13 copies of it were made and given to their close friends for the New Year.’ Качели (katsjeli) means swing, and that’s also the title of their first album (released in 2007, more on Википедия = Wikipedia in Russian).

item.title: Slim – Recently
item.description: Chaos and Decay The diligently crafted fan clip provides a brief lesson in Russian recent history. Chaos and decay are central themes; in barely 3 minutes, more of that passes than can be explained here. Boris Yeltsin doesn’t come off well, but he does do a funny dance.
